titleStmt.title: To Mr. WORSDALE: Occasion'd by seeing CELIA's Picture unfinish'd. Writ extempore at Kensington.
titleStmt.author: Stephen Duck

bibl.title: To Mr. WORSDALE: Occasion'd by seeing CELIA's Picture unfinish'd. Writ extempore at Kensington.
bibl.author: Stephen Duck

front.head: To Mr. WORSDALE: Occasion'd by seeing CELIA's Picture unfinish'd. Writ extempore at Kensington.

lg.l: YET, WORSDALE, yet, thou must exert thy Art,
To paint the matchless Virtues of her
'Tis not enough, that Wit and Beauty join;
But, in her Face, let Sense and Judgment shine;
Let godlike Bounty crown her gen'rous Soul,
So, in thy Piece, shall each Beholder see
